Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.mongo

[Java] Class MongoDatastore

      • org.grails.datastore.mapping.mongo.MongoDatastore
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.MappingContext$Listener, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.StatelessDatastore

        public class MongoDatastore
extends org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.AbstractDatastore

        A Datastore implementation for the Mongo document store.

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        1.0

        • Constructor Detail

          • public MongoDatastore()

            Constructs a MongoDatastore using the default database name of "test" and defaults for the host and port. Typically used during testing.

          • public MongoDatastore(MongoMappingContext mappingContext, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> connectionDetails, com.mongodb.MongoClientOptions mongoOptions, org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx)

            Constructs a MongoDatastore using the given MappingContext and connection details map.

            Parameters:
            mappingContext - The MongoMappingContext
            connectionDetails - The connection details containing the MONGO_HOST and MONGO_PORT settings

          • public MongoDatastore(MongoMappingContext mappingContext, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> connectionDetails, org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx)

            Constructs a MongoDatastore using the given MappingContext and connection details map.

            Parameters:
            mappingContext - The MongoMappingContext
            connectionDetails - The connection details containing the MONGO_HOST and MONGO_PORT settings

          • public MongoDatastore(MongoMappingContext mappingContext)

          • public MongoDatastore(MongoMappingContext mappingContext, com.mongodb.Mongo mongo, org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx)

            Constructor for creating a MongoDatastore using an existing Mongo instance

            Parameters:
            mappingContext - The MappingContext
            mongo - The existing Mongo instance

          • public MongoDatastore(MongoMappingContext mappingContext, com.mongodb.Mongo mongo, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String> connectionDetails, org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx)

            Constructor for creating a MongoDatastore using an existing Mongo instance. In this case the connection details are only used to supply a USERNAME and PASSWORD

            Parameters:
            mappingContext - The MappingContext
            mongo - The existing Mongo instance
